name: One Dark Day (Leonius)
description:
In a world where being a villain is the ultimate achievement, you’re a down-on-their-luck evil overlord who finds themselves running out of one critical resource: patience.

You’ve decided that today is it: keep your patience high, your minions satisfied, and the world shall tremble at your pointy metal boots. Run out of patience, neglect your underlings, and you’ll live out the rest of your days in an idyllic farm, watching baby goats merrily frolic. Disgusting!
